com.microsoft.windowsazure.services.media

Class MediaConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.microsoft.windowsazure.services.media.MediaConfiguration

  • public final class MediaConfiguration
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides functionality to create a media services configuration.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String OAUTH_CLIENT_ID
      Defines the OAUTH configuration client ID constant.
      static java.lang.String OAUTH_CLIENT_SECRET
      Defines the OAUTH configuration client secret constant.
      static java.lang.String OAUTH_SCOPE
      Defines the SCOPE of the media service sent to OAUTH.
      static java.lang.String OAUTH_URI
      Defines the OAUTH configuration URI constant.
      static java.lang.String URI
      Defines the media service configuration URI constant.

    • Method Detail

      • configureWithOAuthAuthentication

        public static Configuration configureWithOAuthAuthentication(java.lang.String mediaServiceUri,
                                             java.lang.String oAuthUri,
                                             java.lang.String clientId,
                                             java.lang.String clientSecret,
                                             java.lang.String scope)
        Creates a media service configuration using the specified media service base URI, OAUTH URI, client ID, and client secret.
        Parameters:
        mediaServiceUri - A String object that represents the media service URI.
        oAuthUri - A String object that represents the OAUTH URI.
        clientId - A String object that represents the client ID.
        clientSecret - A String object that represents the client secret.
        scope - A String object that represents the scope.
        Returns:
        A Configuration object that can be used when creating an instance of the MediaService class.

      • configureWithOAuthAuthentication

        public static Configuration configureWithOAuthAuthentication(Configuration configuration,
                                             java.lang.String mediaServiceUri,
                                             java.lang.String oAuthUri,
                                             java.lang.String clientId,
                                             java.lang.String clientSecret,
                                             java.lang.String scope)
        Creates a media service configuration using the specified configuration, media service base URI, OAuth URI, client ID, and client secret.
        Parameters:
        configuration - A previously instantiated Configuration object.
        mediaServiceUri - A String object that represents the URI of media service.
        oAuthUri - A String object that represents the URI of OAuth service.
        clientId - A String object that represents the client ID.
        clientSecret - A String object that represents the client secret.
        scope - A String object that represents the scope.
        Returns:
        A Configuration object that can be used when creating an instance of the MediaService class.

      • configureWithOAuthAuthentication

        public static Configuration configureWithOAuthAuthentication(java.lang.String profile,
                                             Configuration configuration,
                                             java.lang.String mediaServiceUri,
                                             java.lang.String oAuthUri,
                                             java.lang.String clientId,
                                             java.lang.String clientSecret,
                                             java.lang.String scope)
        Creates a media service configuration using the specified profile, configuration, media service base URI, OAuth URI, client ID, and client secret.
        Parameters:
        profile - A String object that represents the profile.
        configuration - A previously instantiated Configuration object.
        mediaServiceUri - A String object that represents the URI of media service.
        oAuthUri - A String object that represents the URI of OAUTH service.
        clientId - A String object that represents the client ID.
        clientSecret - A String object that represents the client secret.
        scope - A String object that represents the scope.
        Returns:
        A Configuration object that can be used when creating an instance of the MediaService class.
